attributes.action: Commence an air-lift from European countries for vulnerable Ukrainian refugees.
attributes.additional_details:
Because the UK is a nation that is a force for good in our world.
Because whilst our Government may have decided not put boots on the ground in Ukraine, it has an obligation on our behalf, to ensure that those fighting for freedom an peace in Ukraine can be confident that we here will do all in our power to shelter their vulnerable citizens whilst they fight Russian aggression.
attributes.background: Commence an air-lift from European countries bordering Ukraine to expedite the transfer Ukrainian refugees, displaced by Russian aggression, from those nations to ours such that we can provide emergency assistance to those most vulnerable persons in their time of need.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Draw up and implement a specific Ukrainian refugee strategy for the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609431
